channel.title: RSC Revolution - New RSC Server
channel.description:
[b]RSC Revolution[/b][i] is a new server that is based on RSCD v25. It is not very heavily edited, but we will be updating it every day. We are currently not on a VPS or DEDI, but hope to get one soon. Our website link is in my signature and client download link also in it.[/i] [b]Pictures will be posted in a bit.[/b] [b]Database completely restored. Thank you.[/b]
[b]Until later, Stupit.[/b]

item.title: RSC Revolution - New RSC Server
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“FDNY, post:64, topic:307910”][quote author=bushwacked link=topic=404031.msg3002043#msg3002043 date=1256077170]
hmm is rsca the best server yet again now?
[/quote]

Never was.

Not necessarily the best server, just most populated.[/quote]
there is no ‘best server’ because the word ‘best’ differs to every person. but if you mean the most sucessful, then yes.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“freaky5000, post:58, topic:307910”]I have just found an important glitch within your forums, i.r.freaky@gmail.com is my msn. Ask for the fix.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2009, 09:28:59 am[/size][hr]Sorry, but some fuckwit has decided to exploit your glitch and has now fucked over your forum, like i said in the above post my msn is in my signature i will show you how to fix it if you add me on msn.

Edit: Managed to restore your forums finally gaining access to admin panel again since he turned the boards to offline mode. Restored most of the stuff and ip banned the retard.

Have a nice day.[/quote]
Thank you freaky.

item.title: RSC Revolution - New RSC Server
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

mr.big:

This is why servers never stay up long, everyone just trash talks them. You people never give anyone a chance to get started. I have never posted before but I’m always on the forums reading and looking through. Its sad how trash the community is on here, give people a chance ffs. I’m sure everyone that knows anything about making an rsc server or anything like that had to learn about it. Also stop hacking peoples shit and crashing there servers, Aight that’s all I have to say about that I’m sure there will be tons of smart ass comments coming my way for what I said. Good luck with the server man!

There are certail requirements which really should be met before undertaking a task such as running an MMO server. The ability to maintain a webserver and the operating system are two such requirements.

@Stupit - install the php module bcmath

Read full topic
